cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.model

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.model.UserManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UserAdmin

    public class UserManager
extends Object
    This class is model for basic working with Users entities.
    Author:
    Matěj Bartoň (bartom47@fel.cvut.cz)

        public UserManager()

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public final Users login(String userMail,
                         String passwd)
                  throws NonExistingUserException,
                         Exception
        This method represents the login process.
        Parameters:
        userMail - - String email address to identify the user
        passwd - - String uncrypted value of the users password
        Returns:
        a Users entity to be set as logged in user
        Throws:
        NonExistingUserException - when the password is incorrect or the user with given email does not exist.
        Exception - if the process failed from other reasons

      • changePasswd

        public final void changePasswd(Users user,
                               String NewPasswd)
                        throws UserManagerException
        Sets given user a new password according to the password given.
        Parameters:
        user - - a Users entity of which the password will be changed
        NewPasswd - - an uncrypted String object of the new password
        Throws:
        UserManagerException - when the process fails

      • checkAdministrator

        public final boolean checkAdministrator(Users user)
        Checks if given user has administrator rights.
        Parameters:
        user - - a Users entity
        Returns:
        true if given user has administrator rights, false if not.
